Row.Text: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Epithets[ENDCOLOR] is a new gameplay mechanic based upon your people's assessment of your rule at the beginning of each new Era. During any given Era, certain actions will accumulate Epithet Progress. On entering a new Era, if you have enough Epithet Progress, your people will recognise you with an Epithet - a special title and a one-time reward based on your dominant actions during the last Era. This will continue each Era until the end of the game.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Epithet Progress can be accumulated by building Wonders, earning Great People, conquering and razing cities, starting Golden Ages and WLTKDs, and spending Faith and Gold. Progress is reset each Era.

Your kindness has left its mark; for the many 'We Love the King Days' that you have started, you have become known as '[COLOR_JFD_EPITHET]the Beloved[ENDCOLOR],' granting you [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production in all your cities.
Your conquests have left their mark; for the many cities that you have captured, you have become known as '[COLOR_JFD_EPITHET]the Conqueror[ENDCOLOR],' granting you XP for all your Units.

Your battles have left their mark; for the many Great Admirals and Great Generals that you have spawned, you have become known as '[COLOR_JFD_EPITHET]the Great[ENDCOLOR],' granting you [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence with all currently known City-States.

Your devotion has left its mark; for the Faith that you have spent, you have become known as '[COLOR_JFD_EPITHET]the Holy[ENDCOLOR],' granting you a free [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Person of your choice.

Your great works have left their mark; for the Cultural Great People that you have spawned, you have become known as '[COLOR_JFD_EPITHET]the Illustrious[ENDCOLOR],' granting you a free [ICON_CULTURE] Social Policy.
Your fairness has left its mark; for the many Golden Ages that you have started, you have become known as '[COLOR_JFD_EPITHET]the Just[ENDCOLOR],' starting a 'We Love the King Day' in all cities.
Your generosity has left its mark; for the Gold that you have spent, you have become known as '[COLOR_JFD_EPITHET]the Magnanimous[ENDCOLOR],' granting [ICON_FOOD] Food in all your cities.
Your monuments have left their mark; for the many wonders that you have built, you have become known as '[COLOR_JFD_EPITHET]the Magnificent[ENDCOLOR],' starting a [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age.

Your brutality has left its mark; for the many cities that you have Razed, you have become known as '[COLOR_JFD_EPITHET]the Terrible[ENDCOLOR],' ending [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance in all your cities.
Your wisdom has left its mark; for the many Great People that you have spawned, you have become known as '[COLOR_JFD_EPITHET]the Wise[ENDCOLOR],' granting you a free [ICON_RESEARCH] Technology.
